title: What are some examples of short paragraphs? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can imagine writing a story with dialogue where the short paragraphs are: “No.” “Oh?” “Yes.” “Me.” Shortest I can can come up with, (following the question “What’s the 9th letter of the alphabet?”) would probably be “I.”
A short paragraph is a paragraph containing 2–5 sentences.
